name: Mjollnir
description: Thor's magical hammer, made for him by the dwarves Brok and Eitri.

abilities.name: Static Charge
abilities.description: Places a charged shield on the target ally that a chance to release electric bolts upon the ally taking damage. The bolts hit the source of the damage, as well as additional nearby enemies around the ally, dealing magical damage.
notes: Successive casts on the same target do not stack but refresh the duration
Reacts on any damage above a threshold (after all reductions), attacks and abilities alike
The source of the damage can be any unit, including allies, buildings, and wards
Does not react on self-inflicted damage, or on damage flagged as HP Removal
Static Charge's effect has a downtime after it procs, limiting the amount of times it can proc
All bolts together can deal up to 1125 damage (before reductions)

abilities.name: Chain Lightning
abilities.description: Grants the wielder's attacks a chance to pierce through evasion, and to release a bolt of electricity on the target, that leaps between other nearby targets, dealing magical damage to all of them.
notes: The lightning bounces in 0.25-second intervals, hitting 12 targets takes 2.75 seconds
All bounces together can deal up to 2160 damage (before reductions)
Against a lone target, Chain Lightning adds an average of 45 magical spell damage to every attack
Chain Lightning uses a custom cooldown system. It is neither displayed on the item icon when procced nor is affected by cooldown manipulation
Attacks which proc Chain Lightning cannot miss
Chain Lightning from Maelstrom-based items have no stacking priority; The oldest source within the inventory takes priority
Illusions take increased damage from the lightning

additionalInfo: Mjollnir is very effective against heroes with illusions like Naga Siren, Spectre and particularly Phantom Lancer and Chaos Knight that can surround you because the lightning goes all around you compared to cleave and the Static Charge has more chance to be triggered
This item is very good for pushing, you can apply the Static Charge on a creep to push a lane safely while you jungle and get extra gold
This is the most effective item to push back mega creeps
